accountMode.single: This account uses a single signature.

multipleSignersInfo: This action requires multiple signatures. Please provide enough secret keys to meet the threshold.

confirm.testModeDescription: Existing flow: Enter secret key, gather all required signatures, and send directly to Horizon.
confirm.prepareDescription: Only prepare XDR for production multisig. Nothing will be sent immediately.

prepare.title: Transaction prepared for multisig
prepare.subtitle: The transaction is built and can be externally signed.
prepare.notSentHint: This transaction has not yet been sent to the network.

testMode.modalDescription: Here you can enter all the necessary secret keys on a single device and send the transaction directly. In real multi-party setups, the keys should remain on separate devices.

banner.title: Productive mode for multi-signature
banner.body: In this mode, the Stellar Account Manager only uses your own secret key. Additional signatures are collected through exported XDR files. Secure your XDR files and only share them with trusted signers.

detail.title: Pending-Multisig-Job
detail.importSignedXdrDescription: Insert a signed XDR. New signatures will be incorporated into the current transaction.

xdr.title: Transaction
xdr.hint: This XDR can be loaded and signed by other signers in compatible wallets.
xdr.copy.error: XDR could not be copied to the clipboard.

signedXdr.title: Import signed XDR
signedXdr.hint: Insert an XDR signed by another signer here to merge the signatures with this multisig job.
signedXdr.label: Signed XDR

success.title: Signatures updated
success.body: The signatures were successfully merged with this multisig job. Current status: {{status}}.

options.title: Signature options for this multisig account

distributed.title: Standard: Distributed Multisig Flow
distributed.body: By default, this session only signs with your own private key. Additional signatures are added via exported XDR files or a job ID from other signers.

localAll.title: Enter all signatures locally.
localAll.body: Choose this option only if you control all secret keys associated with this account (z. B. nach einer Kontorettung mit mehreren Signern). The Stellar Account Manager will then collect all signatures locally and send the transaction directly to Horizon.
localAll.checkboxLabel: Enter all signatures locally in this dialog and send them directly.
localAll.warning: Note: If you enter all signatures locally, all secret keys will be present in this session. Use this option only on trusted devices.

errors.mismatchedHash: The signed XDR does not belong to this transaction.

success.title: Multisig job created
success.body: The multisig job with the ID {{id}} has been created. Additional signers can sign the XDR file once it has been exported.

statusHelp.pending: The multisig job has been created, but there are no signatures yet.
statusHelp.partiallySigned: Some signatories have already signed. More signatures are still needed.
statusHelp.readyToSubmit: There are enough signatures present. The transaction can be sent to Horizon.
statusHelp.submitted: The transaction has been sent to the network. Check the final account balance if necessary.
statusHelp.failed: An error occurred while sending the transaction. Please refer to the error log for details.
